name: Just Beyond the Veil
description:
The Association has been slowly taking over all of the neighboring sectors of space. For the saboteur, this mission was supposed to be like all of the rest - a flawless victory. But when something goes wrong she's forced to reflect on the choices that brought her here.

Content Warning - The script includes references to the following:

  • War
  • Death

This game was created for O2A2, a jam that challenges participants to create a visual novel in one week with only one of every asset and less than 1,000 words. Our game contains:

  • Just under 1,000 words
  • 1 Background
  • 1 Music track
  • 1 Voice Actor

Our team:

Art & UIHadara MadrakEditingLunaterraVoice ActingCamille "Coda" WeefurWriting, Scripting, and DirectionJohn Madrak

Special thanks to Courtney and Jacob for their feedback during the development process.

Additional Credits:

Phantasm by Kevin MacLeod
